mainText:
Steve Jobs has affected all our lives in one way or another. I never knew
him, I'm just a consumer, but I have hugely enjoyed Apple products since the
'90s. Wow. What can we say about the impact this one man had on all of us. I
am saddened but hope that he passed in peace and is existing in peace now.

Best Regards, Steve. We will all miss you.
header: What a sad day...miss you Steve.
author: Rex
